summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal water plant and system; providing for the acquisition and construction of a water supply pipeline to supply Mercer Island and the East Shore of Lake Washington together with the necessary right of way, surveys and engineering investigations incidental thereto and the purchase of all supplies, materials, appliances, equipment and facilities in connection therewith; declaring the estimate cost thereof; authorizing plans and specifications for and the construction thereof; authorizing expenditures and appropriating $1,400,000.00 from the surplus in the Water Fund therefor as an advance to Capital Account.
